title: Requires the commissioner of health to take action when areas of lead poisoning are designated
summary: Requires the commissioner of health to take action when high risk areas of lead poisoning are designated; the commissioner of health is also required to provide written notice instructing such condition be discontinued within a specified period of time.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of health to act when areas of lead poisoning are designated
